overview: HX-01 is an animated short film by hexeosis. An eye warping journey through infinitely patterned space and grid time, in and out of forms and patterns, mandalas and psychedelic landscapes. Colorful calm moments, energetic dynamic sequences and thought-provoking, mind bending constructions woven together into an overall seamless, 100% animated sequence, timed to music and soundscapes.
tagline: An Animated Short Film by hexeosis
title: HX-01
